file.name: openapi-v1.yaml
file.content:
---
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
    title: AiiDAlab apps registry API
    description: API to query for registered AiiDAlab apps.
    version: '1.1'
paths:
    /api/v1/apps_index.json:
        get:
            description: Complete index of all registered AiiDAlab apps.
            responses:
                '200':
                    description: OK
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            schema:
                                $ref: https://aiidalab.github.io/aiidalab-registry/schemas/v1/apps_index.schema.json#/definitions/AppsAndCategories
    /api/v1/apps/{appId}.json:
        parameters:
            - name: appId
              in: path
              required: true
              schema:
                  type: string
              example: hello-world
        get:
            description: Curated data and metadata for a single app entry.
            responses:
                '200':
                    description: OK
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            schema:
                                $ref: https://aiidalab.github.io/aiidalab-registry/schemas/v1/app.schema.json#/definitions/App

Error: parse: parse spec: parse operations: path "/api/v1/apps/{appId}.json": at 1:178: get: at 1:185: responses: 200: at 1:271: content: application/json: at 1:302: schema: at 1:312: parse schema: resolve "https://aiidalab.github.io/aiidalab-registry/schemas/v1/app.schema.json#/definitions/App": external "https://aiidalab.github.io/aiidalab-registry/schemas/v1/app.schema.json": https: do: Get "https://aiidalab.github.io/aiidalab-registry/schemas/v1/app.schema.json": host "aiidalab.github.io" is not allowed
